thread.title: BRIEF-CNH Finance Announces Acquisition Of Triumph Healthcare Finance‍​

title: BRIEF-CNH Finance Announces Acquisition Of Triumph Healthcare Finance‍​

organizations.name: brief-cnh finance announces acquisition of triumph

text: March 19, 2018 / 1:14 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-CNH Finance Announces Acquisition Of Triumph Healthcare Finance‍​ Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Triumph Bancorp Inc: * CNH FINANCE, L.P. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF TRIUMPH HEALTHCARE FINANCE‍​ * CNH FINANCE SAYS ACQUISITION OF TRIUMPH HEALTHCARE FINANCE, A DIVISION OF TBK BANK, SSB, A UNIT OF TRIUMPH BANCORP * CNH FINANCE - UPON DEAL COMPLETION, TRIUMPH HEALTHCARE FINANCE TO BE INTEGRATED INTO CNH FINANCE, BUT WILL CONTINUE TO BE BASED OUT OF PORTLAND‍​ Source text: ( reut.rs/2ICkKcA ) Further company coverage:
